inscription:
Inscribed in black ink, LC: For Abby Grey with much thanks -
Inscribed in pencil, verso: Ben and Abby Grey Foundation, Inc. / POND, Clayton / The Red Chair (underscored)
provenance: The artist, New York; Abby Weed Grey, St. Paul; given to MIA, 1983.
signed: Signed and dated in black ink: Clayton Pond  '67
title: The Red Chair
